title: 急，模组崩溃
txt_content:
如题，电脑重装后没有模组能够正常启动的，下面上1.7.10的崩溃代码：

Minecraft崩溃了！请认真阅读建议。
可能是Mod或其他问题。
java.lang.reflect.InvocationTargetException
        at sun.reflect.NativeMethodAccessorImpl.invoke0(Native Method)
        at sun.reflect.NativeMethodAccessorImpl.invoke(Unknown Source)
        at sun.reflect.DelegatingMethodAccessorImpl.invoke(Unknown Source)
        at java.lang.reflect.Method.invoke(Unknown Source)
        at org.jackhuang.hellominecraft.launcher.Launcher.main(Launcher.java:114)
Caused by: java.lang.UnsupportedClassVersionError: cn/lambdalib/core/LLCorePlugin : Unsupported major.minor version 52.0
        at java.lang.ClassLoader.defineClass1(Native Method)
        at java.lang.ClassLoader.defineClass(Unknown Source)
        at java.security.SecureClassLoader.defineClass(Unknown Source)
        at java.net.URLClassLoader.defineClass(Unknown Source)
        at java.net.URLClassLoader.access$100(Unknown Source)
        at java.net.URLClassLoader$1.run(Unknown Source)
        at java.net.URLClassLoader$1.run(Unknown Source)
        at java.security.AccessController.doPrivileged(Native Method)
        at java.net.URLClassLoader.findClass(Unknown Source)
        at net.minecraft.launchwrapper.LaunchClassLoader.findClass(LaunchClassLoader.java:117)
        at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source)
        at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source)
        at java.lang.Class.forName0(Native Method)
        at java.lang.Class.forName(Unknown Source)
        at cpw.mods.fml.relauncher.CoreModManager.loadCoreMod(CoreModManager.java:460)
        at cpw.mods.fml.relauncher.CoreModManager.discoverCoreMods(CoreModManager.java:389)
        at cpw.mods.fml.relauncher.CoreModManager.handleLaunch(CoreModManager.java:221)
        at cpw.mods.fml.relauncher.FMLLaunchHandler.setupHome(FMLLaunchHandler.java:90)
        at cpw.mods.fml.relauncher.FMLLaunchHandler.setupClient(FMLLaunchHandler.java:67)
        at cpw.mods.fml.relauncher.FMLLaunchHandler.configureForClientLaunch(FMLLaunchHandler.java:34)
        at cpw.mods.fml.common.launcher.FMLTweaker.injectIntoClassLoader(FMLTweaker.java:126)
        at net.minecraft.launchwrapper.Launch.launch(Launch.java:115)
        at net.minecraft.launchwrapper.Launch.main(Launch.java:28)
        ... 5 more

*** Game Exited ***
Exception in thread "main" java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 5
    at cpw.mods.fml.relauncher.FMLSecurityManager.checkPermission(FMLSecurityManager.java:21)
    at java.lang.SecurityManager.checkExit(Unknown Source)
    at java.lang.Runtime.exit(Unknown Source)
    at java.lang.System.exit(Unknown Source)
    at org.jackhuang.hellominecraft.launcher.Launcher.main(Launcher.java:131)


求解，现在等着开服服务端却测试不了

replies.author: Lss233
replies.txt_content:
1029237301 发表于 2017-3-18 07:20
补充1.6.2崩溃输出日志：
[OptiFine] 
[OptiFine] OptiFine_1.6.2_HD_U_C4
不好意思，对这个不是很懂。
应该是显示方面的问题，可以尝试删除Optifine或者更新显卡驱动。

补充1.6.2崩溃输出日志：
[OptiFine] 
[OptiFine] OptiFine_1.6.2_HD_U_C4
[OptiFine] Fri Mar 17 16:57:41 CST 2017
[OptiFine] OS: Windows 7 (x86) version 6.1
[OptiFine] Java: 1.7.0_51, Oracle Corporation
[OptiFine] VM: Java HotSpot(TM) Client VM (mixed mode, sharing), Oracle Corporation
[OptiFine] LWJGL: 2.9.0
[OptiFine] OpenGL: AMD Radeon HD 6570 version 4.5.13397 Compatibility Profile Context 15.200.1046.0, ATI Technologies Inc.
[OptiFine] OpenGL Version: 4.0
[OptiFine] OpenGL Fancy fog: Not available (GL_NV_fog_distance)
[OptiFine] Maximum texture size: 8192x8192
[OptiFine] Checking for new version
[OptiFine] *** Reloading textures ***
[OptiFine] Resource pack: "Default"
[OptiFine] (Reflector) Class not present: ModLoader
[OptiFine] (Reflector) Class not present: LightCache
[OptiFine] (Reflector) Class not present: BlockCoord
[OptiFine] Version found: C4
#
# A fatal error has been detected by the Java Runtime Environment:
#
#  EXCEPTION_ACCESS_VIOLATION (0xc0000005) at pc=0x3be1f77b, pid=7444, tid=164
#
# JRE version: Java(TM) SE Runtime Environment (7.0_51-b13) (build 1.7.0_51-b13)
# Java VM: Java HotSpot(TM) Client VM (24.51-b03 mixed mode, sharing windows-x86 )
# Problematic frame:
# C  [atioglxx.dll+0xcaf77b]
#
# Failed to write core dump. Minidumps are not enabled by default on client versions of Windows
#
# An error report file with more information is saved as:
# E:\游戏\1.6.2\现在加入肯德基豪华午餐！\客户端\基础整合 - 1.6.2\hs_err_pid7444.log
#
# If you would like to submit a bug report, please visit:
#   http://bugreport.sun.com/bugreport/crash.jsp

# See problematic frame for where to report the bug.

replies.author: Lss233
replies.txt_content:
你的LambdaLib需要1.8的Java，而你目前使用的 Java版本为1.7.0_51
建议去这里下载最新版本

Lss233 发表于 2017-3-17 21:41
你的LambdaLib需要1.8的Java，而你目前使用的 Java版本为1.7.0_51
建议去这里下载最新版本 ...

replies.txt_content: 更换为JAVA8和更新显卡驱动试试看吧
